Industry.label: Industry
Industry.value: Radio And Television Broadcasting And Communications Equipment

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ericsson is primary supplier of telecommunications equipment. The company's three major operating segments are networks, digital services, and managed services. Ericsson sells hardware, software, and services primarily to communications service providers while licensing patents to handset manufacturers. The Stockholm-based company derives sales worldwide and had 101,000 employees as of June.

value.name: Erik Ekudden
value.title: CTO, Senior VP & Head-Group Function Technology
